{{Description|Talented musicians from around the world including Belgium, South Korea, and the United States, will showcase the unique charm of symphonic, pop, and a cappella music, respectively, with their renditions of the melodious Genshin Impact soundtrack.}}
'''GENSHIN CONCERT 2021 "Melodies of an Endless Journey"''' is an online web event featuring musicians from the United States, Belgium, and South Korea playing covers of [[Genshin Impact]]'s [[Soundtrack]].
